summary: Highly driven software developer with a decade of experience across diverse industries including Real Estate, Payments, Health, and Finance. Specialized in Web Development, Micro Frontends, InnerSource, and Architecture Design. Passionate about enhancing developer experience through improved documentation and task automation.

accomplishments: Created a system to measure the Software Reusing at Scotiabank, using several sources of informations.
Implemented Backstage to increase the Developer Experience (DX) for over 200 developers across various regions.
Worked with teams in different regions across America, to promote the software reuse.
Advocated the InnerSource adoption at Scotiabank, and, created documentation, provided talks and guidance.
Architect and write front end code for the foundation and complex features of each project.
Work closely with our design and UX teams to deliver next generation experiences across our applications.
Created technical documentation for front end aspects of the project.
Implemented successfully the Microfrontend architecture for 7 application in one of the most important customer flows.
Created and maintained group of reusable libraries for Frontend projects.
Led a frontend community made of ~20 people.
Developed scalable React + Redux applications for global Endava clients, using pm2, yarn, ES6, SASS, Webpack 2.x, Semantic UI, Node.js, Express.js, Redux-Saga, and Firebase.
Performed code reviews and documented Confluence projects.
Worked on Project Helios, a global alliance between Renault and Nissan to develop a new global digital customer engagement platform.
Utilized JAVA, J2EE, Servlets, AEM (Adobe Experience Manager), JavaScript, BackboneJS, MarionetteJS, Spring Framework, ApiGee, MongoDB, and Elastic Search.
Supported QA Teams in setting up environments and providing mock data.
Conducted demos to clients and prepared QA environments.

education.certificate: Machine Learning and Data Science, Online
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Colombia
